column3: Department of Materials Science and Engineering
column5: Prepare for a career in industry or research by learning the concepts and theories that make materials science and engineering possible.It is estimated that 70 per cent of innovations are due to an advance in materials. This course provides a solid grounding across a wide variety of materials, and aims to prepare you for a career in industry or research by teaching you the concepts and theories that make materials science and engineering possible. Our research-led teaching introduces you to all the latest developments. You’ll have the option to keep your course general or tailor your degree with optional modules to specialise in the area that interests you the most.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
